meanings.definition: A particular part or feature of something.
meanings.sent1: The colorful aspect of the painting caught my eye.
meanings.sent2: She admired the beautiful aspect of the landscape.
meanings.sent3: The playful aspect of the puppy's behavior always brings a smile to my face.
meanings.sent4: The aspect of trust is like a fragile glass sculpture, easily shattered.
meanings.sent5: The aspect of kindness in her actions left a lasting impression on me.

meanings.definition: The way in which a thing may be viewed or regarded.
meanings.sent1: From a different aspect, the problem seemed much simpler.
meanings.sent2: His optimistic aspect on life is truly inspiring.
meanings.sent3: Looking at the situation from a humorous aspect, it seemed quite ridiculous.
meanings.sent4: Her aspect on forgiveness is like a beacon of light in a dark tunnel.
meanings.sent5: The aspect of determination in his eyes was unmistakable.

meanings.definition: A distinct feature or element in a problem or situation.
meanings.sent1: The financial aspect of the project needs careful consideration.
meanings.sent2: The historical aspect of the event was fascinating to learn about.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected aspect of the surprise party made it even more special.
meanings.sent4: The aspect of time is a relentless force that cannot be stopped.
meanings.sent5: The aspect of teamwork is crucial for the success of any group project.
